title: The Fatal glass of beer
creator_credit: Mack Sennett Comedies, Mack Sennett and Clyde Bruckman
brief_description: This film is about a prodigal son returning to a snowbound cabin in the Yukon. Described as an absurd star comedy with appeal to addicts only: most of the humour consists of repeats of one line, “Taint a fit night out for man nor beast”. This film was written by W.C. Fields who also starred in it, along with Rosemary Theby, George Chandler and Richard Cramer.
